term.title: charge recombination

item.text: Reverse of charge separation. In using this term it is important to specify the resulting electronic state of the donor and acceptor.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2231 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
